GET YOUR VOICE HEARD: REGISTER TO VOTE!
There are 7.5 million people not registered to vote. If you're not registered to vote, you're invisible.
Young people can decide the future of this country if they register to vote and #turnup to vote on June 23rd in the EU Referedum.
Alone, you may believe you have little influence. But together, no one can ignore us.
CLICK HERE TO JOIN THE ELECTORAL REGISTER TODAY!
(It just takes 5 minutes)
HELP START SOMEONE'S NCS JOURNEY WITH A SMILE!
We're looking for enthusiastic NCS Graduates to welcome this year's NCS participants at Information Evenings and Kick Offs
Opportunities from now until August
Loads of fun, great experience for your CV, and a huge benefit to others - check out the job description here!
CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFORMATION!
WORK EXPERIENCE AT EUROPE'S LARGEST CORPORATE EVENT!
Be part of IFSEC International and work alongside over 27,000 professionals from all over the world!
As a Showmaker you will learn from the UBM events team about event logistics and how to give excellent customer service.
Tuesday 21st - Thursday 23rd of June
